text:
JANE M. SMITH, RN, BSN

Registered Nurse | Clinical Care | Patient Advocacy
Email: jane.smith@example.com
Phone: (555) 987-6543
Location: Chicago, IL, USA
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/janesmith-rn

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Compassionate Registered Nurse with 7+ years of experience providing high-quality patient care in
acute care and outpatient clinical settings. Proven ability to collaborate with multidisciplinary healthcare
teams, manage complex patient cases, and ensure compliance with healthcare regulations and patient
safety standards.

CLINICAL SKILLS

Patient Care: Patient Assessment, Care Planning, Vital Signs Monitoring, Medication Administration
Clinical Procedures: IV Therapy, Wound Care, Catheterization, Infection Control
Healthcare Systems: Electronic Health Records (Epic, Cerner), Clinical Documentation
Compliance & Safety: HIPAA Compliance, Patient Privacy, Risk Management

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

REGISTERED NURSE
Mercy General Hospital — Chicago, IL
March 2019 – Present
- Provide direct patient care for medical-surgical and post-operative patients
- Administer medications and monitor patient responses to treatment
- Coordinate care with physicians, specialists, and allied health professionals
- Maintain accurate clinical documentation within EHR systems
CLINICAL NURSE
Lakeside Family Health Clinic — Evanston, IL
June 2016 – February 2019
- Assisted physicians during examinations and minor procedures
- Educated patients on treatment plans, medications, and preventative care
- Managed appointment scheduling and follow-up care coordination

EDUCATION

BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN NURSING (BSN)
University of Illinois at Chicago — Chicago, IL
Graduated: May 2016

LICENSURE & CERTIFICATIONS

Registered Nurse (RN) — State of Illinois
Basic Life Support (BLS) Certification
Advanced Cardiac Life Support (ACLS) Certification

VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE

COMMUNITY HEALTH VOLUNTEER
Chicago Free Health Clinic
- Provided basic health screenings and patient education services

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

Work Authorization: Authorized to work in the United States
Languages: English (Native), Polish (Conversational)
Professional Interests: Patient Advocacy, Community Health, Healthcare Quality Improvement
